entry.title: Microsoft leads shift beyond data unification to organization, delivering next-gen AI readiness with new Microsoft Fabric capabilities - The Official Microsoft Blog
entry.summary: We’re in a hinge moment for AI. The experiments are over and the real work has begun. Centralizing data, once the finish line, is now the starting point. The definition of “AI readiness” is evolving as increasingly sophisticated agents demand rich, contextualized data grounded in business operations to deliver meaningful results. What sets leaders apart...

entry.title: How Prime members can get early tickets for 'Wicked: For Good’ only on Fandango
entry.summary: Prime members will be able to buy tickets to the early screening of ‘Wicked: For Good’ and see it four days before its theatrical release.

entry.title: Reaching Across the Isles: UK-LLM Brings AI to UK Languages With NVIDIA Nemotron
entry.summary: Trained on the Isambard-AI supercomputer, UK-LLM enables AI reasoning for Welsh and other UK languages for public services.

entry.title: A joint statement from Microsoft and OpenAI - The Official Microsoft Blog
entry.summary: Microsoft and OpenAI have signed a non-binding memorandum of understanding (MOU) for the next phase of our partnership. We are actively working to finalize contractual terms in a definitive agreement. Together, we remain focused on delivering the best AI tools for everyone, grounded in our shared commitment to safety.

entry.title: Five Years On, Reels Reigns as India's Top Short-Form Video Platform
entry.summary: Findings from a new Meta-commissioned IPSOS study show that Reels across our platforms is India’s top driver of daily video consumption ahead of other surveyed platforms.

entry.title: Flexible work update - The Official Microsoft Blog
entry.summary: Amy Coleman, Executive Vice President and Chief People Officer, shared the below communication with Microsoft employees this morning. How we work has forever changed. I remember starting at Microsoft in the late ‘90s, always in the office, no laptops, and primarily working with the people right down the hall. As technology evolved and our business expanded, we became...

entry.title: NVIDIA Partners With AI Infrastructure Ecosystem to Unveil Reference Design for Giga-Scale AI Factories
entry.summary: At this week’s AI Infrastructure Summit in Silicon Valley, NVIDIA’s VP of Accelerated Computing Ian Buck unveiled a bold new vision: the transformation of traditional data centers into fully integrated AI factories. As part of this initiative, NVIDIA is developing reference designs to be shared with partners and enterprises worldwide — offering an NVIDIA Omniverse Read Article

entry.title: Now Live: Europe’s First Exascale Supercomputer, JUPITER, Accelerates Climate Research, Neuroscience, Quantum Simulation
entry.summary: At JUPITER’s inauguration ceremony in Jülich, attended by Germany Chancellor Friedrich Merz, the Jülich Supercomputing Centre and NVIDIA unveiled ways the supercomputer is already spurring innovation across the world.

entry.title: Attach Text to Your Threads Posts and Share Longer Perspectives
entry.summary: We're rolling out a way for you to attach up to 10,000 characters of text to a Threads post.

entry.title: Instagram Launches A Microdrama Series To Encourage Gen Z To Take Creative Chances
entry.summary: Today, Instagram released a microdrama series in India to inspire Gen Z to take creative risks and bring them together. Titled ‘Party of Two’, the series follows Instagram’s ‘Anyway’ campaign from this year.

entry.title: Meta’s Kansas City Data Center and Upcoming AI-Optimized Data Centers
entry.summary: Our Kansas City data center is now operational, representing a $1 billion investment in Missouri and in our global infrastructure that brings our technologies to billions of people worldwide.

entry.title: New Instagram Features to Help You Connect
entry.summary: We’re launching features that make it easier to connect with your friends on Instagram.

entry.title: Personal Superintelligence for Everyone

entry.title: You Can Now Edit Videos With Meta AI
entry.summary: We’re launching a generative AI video editing feature across the Meta AI app, the Meta.AI website and the Edits app to help you bring your creative ideas to life.

entry.title: AlphaQubit tackles one of quantum computing’s biggest challenges
entry.summary: AlphaQubit is an AI-based decoder that identifies quantum computing errors with state-of-the-art accuracy.

entry.summary: Prime is packed with tons of great benefits—and you can start enjoying them for free today and ahead of Prime Big Deal Days this October.

entry.title: NVIDIA Unveils Rubin CPX: A New Class of GPU Designed for Massive-Context Inference
entry.summary: NVIDIA® today announced NVIDIA Rubin CPX, a new class of GPU purpose-built for massive-context processing. This enables AI systems to handle million-token software coding and generative video with groundbreaking speed and efficiency.

entry.title: NVIDIA Announces Financial Results for Second Quarter Fiscal 2026
entry.summary: NVIDIA (NASDAQ: NVDA) today reported revenue for the second quarter ended July 27, 2025, of $46.7 billion, up 6% from the previous quarter and up 56% from a year ago. NVIDIA’s Blackwell Data Center revenue grew 17% sequentially.

entry.title: Industry Leaders Transform Enterprise Data Centers for the AI Era With NVIDIA RTX PRO Servers
entry.summary: NVIDIA today announced leading global enterprises have adopted NVIDIA RTX PRO™ Servers — a new category of enterprise data center infrastructure powered by the RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Server Edition GPU — speeding the shift from general-purpose computing clusters to AI factory infrastructure, without a complete data center overhaul.

entry.title: New Shepard NS-35 Mission Updates | Blue Origin
entry.summary: New Shepard NS-35 is targeting liftoff on Thursday, Sept. 18. The uncrewed payload mission will fly more than 40 scientific and research payloads to space.

entry.title: Blue Alchemist Hits Major Milestone Toward Permanent and Sustainable Lunar Infrastructure | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin's pioneering in-space resource utilization system, Blue Alchemist, has successfully completed its Critical Design Review, marking a transformative milestone toward humanity's permanent expansion beyond Earth.

entry.title: The Mission: Blue Origin’s Mars Telecommunications Orbiter | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Built upon our existing and affordable Blue Ring platform, our Mars Telecommunications Orbiter is ready to support NASA’s Mars mission in 2028.

entry.title: Blue Origin’s New Shepard Completes 34th Mission to Space | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin successfully completed its 14th human spaceflight and the 34th flight for the New Shepard program.
